title.rendered: Measuring Virtual Fair Success: Benchmarks and Best Practices

content.rendered:
What does a great virtual fair look like? Join us for a webinar that will spotlight a semester’s worth of valuable insights from our launch of virtual career fairs to higher education institutions, employers, and students. 

We’ll also discuss differences between institution type cohorts to establish benchmarks with your peers and help you plan for Spring semester’s events.

Watch the recording to learn:

  • What to expect from student and employer attendance (and when we expect them to sign up)
  • How attending a fair promotes more student engagement with employers before, during, and after a fair
  • How many total student-employer connections you should expect
  • What makes students not sign up for or (show up for) a session
  • and more!

Followup Resources

  • Virtual Fair Benchmark Report: Get the full rollup of a semester’s worth of valuable virtual fair insights on student and employer engagement, plus key considerations for virtual fair planning. Download the report here.
  • Virtual Fair Spring Kickoff Webinar: Set up your team for success this spring by joining us for a live demo of Handshake’s virtual fair features, best practices for setting up and staffing your fairs, and a preview of upcoming feature releases.
    • Register for January 13th here
    • Register for January 20th (encore) here

See more upcoming events here

excerpt.rendered: What does a great virtual fair look like? Check out our fall virtual fair insights.
